minecraft:written_book_content.title: Forgotten Tale
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Minecraft
pages:
Footsteps. Echoes. Silence.

There must be silence.

Home, safety, soft.

Silence.

Sleep, quiet, life.

Silence.

Fear, terror, alone.

Silence.

Panick. Stumble. Fall.

Noise. 

Death. 

Silence.
